japanese:
真っ白な砂浜とエメラルドグリーンの海！
まさに沖縄のビーチね！
translation:
Pure white sand and the emerald green sea!
This is DEFINITELY a beach in Okinawa!

japanese:
海の色が地元とはまったく違いますね。
神秘的にすら感じます。
translation:
The color of the sea is completely different
from where we're from. It almost feels mysterious.

japanese:
ふわぁ～……。
こんなところで泳いじゃっていいんだ！
translation:
Wowww...
Can we really swim here?!

japanese:
いいんですよ！
もう好き放題に遊んじゃいましょーう！
translation:
Of course!
Let's have as much fun as we can!

japanese:
泳ぐだけじゃなくて、
アクティビティも色々あるからね。
どんどん挑戦しちゃおっか！
translation:
Not only swimming, but there are also
various activities we can try.
Let's give them a shot!

japanese:
フータロー君も、
やりたいことがあったら遠慮なく言って。
translation:
Futaro-kun, if there's anything you want to do,
don't hesitate to speak up.

japanese: ああ、ありがとな。
translation: Yeah, thanks.

japanese:
（こうしてビーチで過ごすとなれば、
　逃げられずに済むか？
　隠れる場所もないわけだし）
translation:
(If we are spending time at the beach like this,
 could I prevent Miku from running away?
 After all, there's nowhere to hide here.)

japanese:
（だが無策で突っ込んでいっても……。
　どうする？）
translation:
(But, if I go in without a plan...
 What should I do?)

japanese: 四葉、作戦開始！
translation: Yotsuba, let's start the operation!

japanese: ラジャー！
translation: Roger!

japanese:
ねー！　みんな、あそこ見て！
面白そうなことが書いてあるよー！
translation:
Heeey! Everyone, look over there!
There's something interesting written there!

japanese: ん？　なんだ？
translation: Huh? What is it?

japanese:
ほら、見てください。
海開きカップルコンテストだそうですよ。
translation:
Look.
It says there's a beach opening couple's contest!

japanese: ……なんだそりゃ？
translation: ...What's that?

japanese:
ふむふむ？
今年の海開きを記念した、
誰でも参加ＯＫのイベントなんだ。
translation:
Hmm, it's an event to commemorate
this year's beach opening,
and anyone can participate.

japanese:
こ、コンテスト形式で、
今日のベストカップルを決めるんですかぁ！
translation:
I-is it a contest to decide
the best couple of the day?

japanese:
ほうほう。
出場カップルのラブラブっぷりを審査すると！
translation:
Oh, oh.
And they will judge the lovey-doveyness
of the participating couples!

japanese:
なんでお前ら、そんなに詳しいんだ？
有名なイベントなのか？
translation:
Why do you guys know so much about this?
Is it a famous event?

japanese: いやー、こういうのってありがちじゃん？
translation: Well, these kinds of events are quite common, aren't they?

japanese: そういうもんか？
translation: Oh, is that so?

japanese: それよりもさ、フータロー君は興味ないの？
translation: Anyway, are you not interested in this, Futaro-kun?

japanese:
あると思うか？
こんな浮かれたイベント、俺の人生とは無関係だ。
translation:
Do you think I am?
These kinds of events are not my cup of tea.

japanese: 三玖は？
translation: How about you, Miku?

japanese:
え、ええっ！？
私も、こういうのはちょっと……。
translation:
Wha-whaaa?!
I-I'm also not really into...

japanese:
でも、沖縄での思い出になりそうだし
お兄ちゃんと三玖さんで出てみたらどうかな？
translation:
But, it could be a good memory of Okinawa.
Why don't you try participating with big bro,
Miku-san?

japanese: え。
translation: Eh.

japanese:
ら、らいは？
お前なにを言い出して……。
translation:
R-Raiha?
What are you saying...?

japanese:
お兄ちゃんと三玖さん、お似合いだもん。
絶対優勝できるよ。
translation:
You and Miku-san look good together.
You guys could definitely win.

japanese:
そうですよね！
このビーチにいるカップルで一番お似合いですよ！
translation:
That's right!
You two are the most compatible couple
here on the beach!

japanese:
な、な、なに言ってるの四葉まで。
そんなの無理……！
translation:
Wh-wh-what are you talking about,
Yotsuba? That's impossible!

japanese:
あらそう？
三玖が無理なら、私がフー君と出ようかしら。
translation:
Is that so?
Well, if Miku won't do it,
then maybe I'll participate with Fu-kun instead.

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
私たちなら優勝間違いなしよ。
そう思うでしょ、フー君？
translation:
You and me, there's no doubt we'll win.
Don't you think so, Fu-kun?

japanese:
ま、待って二乃。
なんで……。
translation:
Just a minute, Nino.
Why are you doing this...

japanese:
そう？
私のほうがいけると思うな。
translation:
Why not?
I think I'm better suited for the role.

japanese: ええっ！？
translation: Huhhh?!

japanese:
なんなんだよ、二乃も一花も。
変な冗談は止めろって。
translation:
What's going on, Nino, Ichika?
Cut out the weird jokes.

japanese:
冗談じゃなくて本気だよ？
君の恋人を演じて、どこまで通用するか
試してみようかなって。
translation:
It's not a joke, I'm serious.
How about I act as your lover,
and see how far we place in the competition?

japanese: ね、ねえ、ちょっと待って――
translation: H-hey, wait a minute%p-2;――

japanese: わっ、私も出てもいいですよ！？
translation: I-I don't mind entering, either.

japanese: 五月まで……！？
translation: You too Itsuki...?!

japanese:
さ、さあ上杉君！
誰と出場するか決めてくださいっ！
translation:
C-come on, Uesugi-kun!
Decide who you're going to partner with!

japanese: 私よね？
translation: Of course with me, right?

japanese: 私と出よ？
translation: Shall we participate together?

japanese:
だ、だから！
なんなんだよ、さっきから！
そもそも俺は出るつもりは――
translation:
S-so tell me!
What is going on here?!
I never planned on participating in the first place%p-2;――

japanese: ダメッ！
translation: You CAN'T!

japanese: ちょ、三玖！？
translation: W-woah, Miku?!

japanese: フータローは私のだから！！
translation: Futaro is MINE!!
Huh...

japanese:
ふーん。
三玖にそこまで言われちゃったら、
私たちの出番はないわねぇ。
translation:
Hmm.
If Miku says so,
I guess we won't be participating after all.
Ah!

japanese: うんうん、その調子で優勝してきてね。
translation:
Yeah, go win that first place, Miku.
Good luck!

japanese: 頑張ってください、三玖！
translation: Do your best, Miku!

japanese: ……お前ら、謀ったな？
translation: ...Did you guys plan this?

japanese: さあ、なんのことかしら？
translation: Hmm, I don't know what you're talking about.

japanese:
そうと決まれば申し込みです！
私、行ってきますね！
translation:
Well, since it's settled, let's go sign up!
I'll be right back!

japanese: あっ！　おい！？
translation: Ah! Hey?!

japanese:
嘘、本当に？
申し込みに行っちゃった！？
translation:
Is she serious?
Did she really go to sign up?!

japanese: ま、待って四葉ぁ！
translation: W, wait, Yotsuba!

japanese:
三玖、無理だ。
あいつに追いつくなんて俺にもお前にもできない……。
translation:
Give up, Miku.
It's impossible to try and catch up with her...

japanese: で、でも！
translation: B-but!

japanese:
で、では、２人は優勝に向けて
作戦会議をお願いします！
translation:
Th-then, you two, please 
come up with a strategy to win!

japanese:
私たちはお邪魔にならないように
あっちに行ってるから。
２人でじっくり話し合いなさい。
translation:
We'll be over there so we don't get in the way.
Please take your time and discuss it together.

japanese: 話し合うって――
translation: Discuss what%p-2;――

japanese: （！　そうか、こいつら……）
translation: (! Oh yeah, these guys...)

japanese: 三玖もだよ？
translation: Miku too, yeah?
Ah...

japanese: それじゃ、ごゆっくり～。
translation: Then, take it easy.

japanese: 行っちゃった……。
translation: They left...

japanese: そうだな……。
translation: Yeah...

japanese: え、えっと……。
translation: U-um...

japanese:
（あいつらが作ってくれた、
　２人きりで話せる時間だ。
　無駄にするわけにはいかねぇ……）
translation:
(They gave us some alone time.
 We can't waste this opportunity...)

japanese: なあ、三玖。
translation: Hey, Miku.

japanese: な、なに？
translation: W-what?

japanese:
コンテストは関係ないんだが、
お前に聞きたいことがある。
translation:
Although it's unrelated to the contest,
there's something I want to ask you.

japanese:
どうして俺を避けてるんだ？
水族館でも聞いたが、
結局、答えをもらってないままだった。
translation:
Why are you avoiding me?
I asked you before at the aquarium,
but you still haven't given me an answer.

japanese:
うやむやにすべきじゃなかったのに、
俺が浮かれて……すまん。
translation:
I shouldn't have let it go unnoticed,
but I got carried away... Sorry.

japanese: そ、そんなこと……。
translation: Th-that's...

japanese:
今度こそ、はっきりと教えてくれ。
俺に原因があるなら――
translation:
This time, tell me clearly.
If it's my fault%p-2;――

japanese: フータローは悪くない。
translation: It's not your fault.

japanese: 私が……勝手に逃げてるだけだから。
translation: I'm...just running off on my own.

japanese:
……なんで逃げる？
理由を教えてくれ。
translation:
...Why are you running away from me?
I want to know why.

japanese:
俺は悪くないって言うが、
俺のせいではあるんじゃないか？
translation:
You say it's not my fault,
but there has to be something I'm doing that's causing this, right?

japanese: いや、俺のせいであって欲しいって言うかな。
translation: No, I want it to be my fault, I guess.

japanese: え？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
お前の心を悩ませるのが俺以外だと思うと、
なんか……気に食わねぇっつーか。
translation:
It bothers me to think
that someone...
other than me, is troubling you.

japanese: それって……。
translation: Well...

japanese:
私も……
ちゃんとフータローに伝えなきゃと思ってた。
translation:
I...
was also thinking of having to tell you about my feelings, Futaro.

japanese:
なのに、伝えたらフータローに呆れられたり、
嫌われちゃうかもって思いもあって……。
translation:
But I was afraid you would be disappointed
or hate me if I did...

japanese:
でも、伝える前から怖がってたら、
もっと悪い結果になって、
取り返しがつかなくなるかもしれない。
translation:
However, if I kept being scared before telling you,
the result could be worse, and it might be irreparable.

japanese:
例えば、フータローと……
すれ違ったまま一緒にいられなくなるとか。
translation:
For example, we might end up unable to be together
even though we pass each other by.

japanese: そんなの嫌だから――
translation: If you don't like that%p-2;――

japanese: フータロー、聞いてくれる？
translation: Futaro, listen?

japanese: ああ。
translation: Yeah.

japanese: ありがとう。
translation: Thanks.

japanese: わ、私……フータローが……お、おお……。
translation:
I-I...thought, that, you, Futaro...
w-would become a w-wo...

japanese: おお？
オオカミ……。
translation: A wolf...

japanese: オオカミ？
translation: Wolf?

japanese:
こ、この旅行中に、
オオカミになるんじゃないかって。
translation:
I-I thought that you might
become a wolf on this trip.

japanese:
……すまん。
どういう意味だ？
translation:
...Sorry.
What do you mean?

japanese:
フータロー、私と……
その、す、すごいことをしたいって
思ってるんじゃないかなって。
translation:
I was just thinking, Futaro...
That, um, maybe you were thinking of wanting
to do something s-spectacular, with me.

japanese: すごいことってなんだよ。
translation: What do you mean, something spectacular?

japanese: だから、えっと、その……。
translation: Well, um, so...

japanese: 恋人同士がする……こと。
translation: Something that...lovers do.

japanese: 恋人同士が……？
translation: That lovers do...?

japanese: って、ええっ！？
translation: Wh-WHAAA?!

japanese: うう……。
translation: Ooohh...

japanese:
お前の勘違いだ！
そんなこと思ってねぇよ！！
translation:
No no, that's just your misunderstanding!
I wasn't thinking of anything like that!!

japanese:
……思ってないの？
フータローは、その……私と……。
translation:
...You weren't?
Futaro, you, um...about me...

japanese:
い、いや！
その、俺だって――
translation:
N-no!
I mean, I%p-2;――

japanese: って、なにを言わせようとしてんだお前は！！
translation: What are you trying to make me say?!?!

japanese:
私のせいで、フータローが我慢してるとか、
そういうのは嫌だから……。
translation:
I don't want things to be like,
you're holding back because of me, Futaro...

japanese:
そこは安心してくれ。
俺は我慢なんかしてない。
translation:
You can rest assured on that.
I'm not holding back at all.

japanese: ……本当に？
translation: ...Really?

japanese: そりゃ、俺も……そういう気持ちはもちろんある。
translation:
I mean, well, I...also have
those kinds of feelings, of course.

japanese: あ、あるんだ。
translation: Y-you do?

japanese:
だからと言って我慢してるつもりはない！
物事には順序ってものがあるんだ、
俺たちはまだ付き合ったばかりなんだぞ！？
translation:
However, that doesn't mean I intend to endure it!
There is a proper order for doing things, you know.
We've only just started dating, right?!

japanese:
だ、だから、まあ、
これから先はどうなるかわからんが――
translation:
S-so, well,
I don't know what will happen from now on%p-2;――

japanese:
三玖の気持ちを無視したりすることは絶対にない。
約束する。
translation:
I promise I will never ignore your feelings, Miku.
I absolutely promise you that.

japanese: フータロー……。
translation: Futaro...

japanese:
私、フータローなら
そう言ってくれるってわかってたのに。
勝手に不安になってた。
translation:
I knew you would say that, Futaro.
But for some reason, I still felt all anxious on my own.

japanese: ごめん……。
translation: Sorry...

japanese:
謝るのは俺のほうだ。
三玖が不安を感じたのは、多分、俺のせいだからな。
translation:
I should be the one apologizing.
You probably felt anxious because of me.

japanese: え？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
実を言うとな、俺も不安になってた。
俺が東京に行ったら遠距離恋愛になるだろ？
translation:
To tell you the truth, I was worried too.
When I go to Tokyo, we're gonna be in
a long-distance relationship, right?

japanese:
だから……離れる前に、お前と
もっと仲を深めたいっつーか、しっかりした絆を
感じたいって、そういうことを考えてたんだ。
translation:
So...before we get separated, I wanted to strengthen
our relationship more, or rather, I wanted to feel
a strong bond between us. Is what I was thinking.

japanese: ……こうして、口にするのは恥ずかしすぎるけどな。
translation:
...It's embarrassing to say it out loud like this,
though.

japanese: そう、だったんだ。
translation: Oh, I didn't know you felt that way.

japanese: それで……お前と……。
translation: And... I was thinking...

japanese: キスを、しようと思ってた。
translation: Of kissing you.

japanese:
俺がオオカミになるかも、
なんて思わせちまったのは
その下心がお前に伝わってたからじゃないか？
translation:
Did you think that I might become a wolf
because you found out about my ulterior motive?

japanese:
悪かった。
１人で勝手に絆がどうこうなんて考える前に、
言葉で伝えるべきだった。
translation: I'm sorry. Instead of worrying on my own, I should have told you directly using words.

japanese:
そ、そんなことない。
私こそ、１人で勝手に悩まないで
フータローに相談すればよかったのに。
translation:
I-it's not just you.
I should have also talked to you
instead of worrying on my own.

japanese: ……だから、お互い様？
translation: ...So, it's mutual, huh?

japanese:
はは、みたいだな。
お互い言い出せないままでいたわけだ。
translation:
Haha, seems that way.
We were both holding back from saying anything.

japanese:
……ふふっ！
なんだか、すごく遠回りした気分。
translation:
...Teehee!
I feel like we took a very roundabout approach to this.

japanese: まあ、それもまた俺達らしいのかもな。
translation: Well, maybe that's just who we are.

japanese: そうかも。
translation: Maybe so.

japanese:
けどな、三玖。
これからはもっと遠慮なしでいかないか？
translation:
However, Miku. From now on,
shall we stop holding back from expressing our feelings to each other?

japanese:
こんな思いはもうしたくない。
三玖が悩んでるなら、一緒に悩ませてくれ。
translation:
I don't want to feel like this anymore.
If you're worried Miku, worry with me.

japanese:
うん。
私もフータローと一緒に悩みたい。
translation:
Yeah.
I want to worry together with you, Futaro.

japanese: 俺たちは……恋人同士なんだからさ。
translation: Because...we're dating, right?

japanese:
う、うん……。
恋人同士、だから。
translation:
Y-yeah...
Because, we're dating.

japanese:
あー……。
こういうのって改めて口にすると
死ぬほど気恥ずかしいな……。
translation:
Ahhh...
saying it out loud like this
makes me feel so embarrassed...

japanese: 私は、もっと言って欲しいかな。
translation: I wish you'd say it more often.

japanese: 勘弁してくれ……。
translation: Spare me...

japanese: 俺は三玖のことをもっと知りたい。
translation: I want to know more about you, Miku.

japanese: お前がそう言ってくれた気持ちが、いまならわかる。
translation: I know now how you felt when you said that.

japanese:
じゃあ、私にももっと知ってほしい？
フータローのこと。
translation: Then, do you want me to know more about you too, Futaro?

japanese:
ああ。
俺のことも全部知ってほしい。
translation:
Yeah.
I want you to know everything about me.

japanese:
（やっと……三玖と気持ちを伝えあうことができた。
　あいつらとらいはに感謝だな）
translation:
(Finally... I was able to convey my feelings to Miku.
 I'm grateful to Raiha and the others.)

japanese:
（とはいえ、結果的に
　キスのことを三玖に知られてしまったわけだが）
translation:
(Although, in the end, Miku found out about
 my plan to try and kiss her.)

japanese:
（いや、お互いの気持ちが伝わっただけで充分だ。
　キスは次の機会に――）
translation:
(No, it's enough, we were able to convey our feelings
 to each other. We can save the kiss for another time%p-2;――%p;)

japanese: お兄ちゃーん！　三玖さーん！　時間だよー！
translation: Big brooo! Miku-saaaan! It's time!

japanese: ステージに行ってくださーい！
translation: Please, come up to the stage!

japanese: 忘れてた……。
translation: I forgot...

japanese: これが残ってたな……。
translation: This was left, eh...

japanese:
ど、どうしよう？
本当に出るの？
translation:
Wh-what should we do?
Are we actually gonna participate?

japanese: ……逃げちまうか？
translation: ...Should we run away?

japanese: えっ……。
translation: Wha%p-2;――

japanese:
フータローくーん！　みーくー！
早く早くー！
translation:
Fuutaaaroo-kuun! Miikuu!
Hurry, huurry!

japanese:
……ううん。
逃げるのはなし、かな。
translation:
...No.
We shouldn't run, I think.
